extendedInfo.description: Real Estate by Smarter Agent combines three powerful, GPS, real estate searches in one easy-to-use app. â¢ Homes for Sale - search all U.S. homes for sale.â¢ Recently Sold Homes - view the selling price of homes sold within the last three years.â¢ Apartments for Rent - find an apartment from a growing list of apartments from top websites like apartments.com.All three options use Smarter Agentâs GPS-triggered real estate search technology to pinpoint your location and find homes and apartments in your immediate area. You can also search for homes by address, city or zip code and refine your search based on price, beds/baths, property type and distance to find just what youâre looking for.Search results reveal:â¢ Priceâ¢ Square footageâ¢ Estimated mortgageâ¢ Taxes â¢ Interior and exterior featuresâ¢ Interactive mapâ¢ Beds/bathsâ¢ Pictures and more!Share what you find! Text or email homes and apartments to your friends, and share the app with them using the âSend to a Friendâ feature on the main menu. You can also save a home or an entire search to access later. If you have questions or want a tour of the home, the "Call" feature will connect you to a real estate professional.If you see the "Broker Reciprocity" logo at the bottom of the data, you are seeing every public MLS listing in that area. Smarter Agent partners with local brokers and agents to gain access not only to their listings but to all listings in that market via a national MLS program called Broker Reciprocity/IDX. If you do not see the "Broker Reciprocity" logo, you will see about 25% of the available listings coming directly from feeds we get from major real estate firms. Real Estate by Smarter Agent is free! Download now and search for homes anytime, anywhere.

reviews.title: Le Pan S
reviews.comment: Crashes often. Does not allow one to edit the title of Favorites properties. Needs to include search options for Pets-Yes/No/Case-by-case. Great search engine, though, and accurate results for chosen parameters. A lot of information on each listing lets me and my partner feel like we\'re making informed decisions. Accurate contact info.
reviews.author: Ken O\'Donnell

reviews.title: Exactly What The Title Says!
reviews.comment: Excellent app. It has listings the other sites do not have, including those do not have a sign in the yard because of a  quiet short sale or other financial agreement.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This app is wonderful!
reviews.comment: Dayna I love this app! It provides all info needed, plus the asking price. When you find ur dream home, it has the ph# already installed. A must get a
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: We are in the early stages of home buying.
reviews.comment: only thing this app does not have is show the house on the map button.  other than that works great!
reviews.author: Jeff Good

reviews.title: Real estate app
reviews.comment: I love how this works!  You can drive into a neighborhood you like and within a couple minutes you know exactly is available in the area!
reviews.author: Tracy Stewart

reviews.title: So far it\'s good!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using this apparently for about one month in my research for a home and I\'ve been pleasantly surprised with what I see on the market.   The find homes in your area doesn\'t always work so well for me but it\'s okay because I don\'t enjoy using the GPS feature often anyway.  Thanks for a great app!
reviews.author: Melissa H

reviews.title: It works sometimes
reviews.comment: Not enough options for excluding small lots when looking for land for hunting. Also it finds land 100 miles away when searching in map mode zoomed in to a 5 mile area.
reviews.author: Scot Kranz

reviews.comment: Its handy but found a few houses that are sold and they are still listed on this app
reviews.author: matt matson

reviews.title: Love the app!!!
reviews.comment: I love this app! If I like the area I am in I can search for homes clos est to my location at the time.  It has been great during our house hunting journey
reviews.author: julie khadka

reviews.title: Graet
reviews.comment: Love the fact that you can read the dimencion of the rooms Great keep it up
reviews.author: Wilberth Rosado

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Love it
reviews.author: Linda Villefranche

reviews.title: My rating
reviews.comment: The screen doesn\'t rotate automatically with pictures, there\'s no back button, have to close app to get to previous screen.
reviews.author: Tony Roberson

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.comment: This app shows me available places very quickly wherever I am.  Love it!
reviews.author: Joseph Simpson

reviews.title: Smart Agent
reviews.comment: I luv this app....;)
reviews.author: Lakenya Miller

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Only problem is that it takes a long time to load. Other than that it\'s really good.
reviews.author: Sheldon Bennett

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Love this app
reviews.author: adrienne jones

reviews.comment: Great app to find homes nearby!
reviews.author: Greg Krupa

reviews.title: Homes
reviews.comment: Absolutely love this app!!  Easy to use, shows great details on each property.   I love the feature that finds homes for sale wherever you are at the time.
reviews.author: Lyn Banghart

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Very informative
reviews.author: Melvin Smith

reviews.comment: The map gets a little finicky when you move it, but the up-to-date listings are great.
reviews.author: Tom Nguyen
